notes:
### v1.3.2
#### NEW FEATURES
- added ui scale option (settings > accessibility)
- added option to set always on top
#### BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
- increased speed of filtering encounters
- added two delete functions in database settings
- fixed log window not remembering size and location
- fixed split lines not working on summary row in live meter
full patch notes on github
send bug reports/suggestions to discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
